descriptionHtml:
====================================
AKAVIRI TANTO
====================================
Author: MadCat221 (MadCat221@gmail.com)

Version: 1.0

September 16, 2012

1. Introduction
2: Installation
3. Version History

===============
1. INTRODUCTION
===============

Adds a Tanto (IE: dagger) for more Akaviri fun for players.  Useful for slitting Thalmor throats.

This mod puts two laying about in Delphine\'s secret room (one replacing a steel dagger in there), and also two into Sky Haven Temple (one replacing an iron dagger in the armory, and the second will appear once they get situated and Esbern gets his desk).  

Also, Esbern carries a (not really that) special tanto with an grade 4 stock Shock enchant.

Like the full-length Blades Sword, this weapon has Elven tier damage and Steel tier weight.  Smithable just like the full-length sword.

As an added feature, I added creation recpies for both this tanto and the Blades katana after you complete Alduin\'s Wall (MQ203 stage 280 done).

This mod\'s mesh is derived from my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16072]De-LARP-ified Blades Sword[/url], which it itself derived from the vanilla Blades sword, and uses the same texture paths.

===============
2. INSTALLATION
===============

Unpack the ESP module \"AkaviriTanto.esp\" and the accompanying Meshes folder into your Skyrim\\Data directory.  Or let Nexus Mod Manager do it all for you.

==================
3. VERSION HISTORY
==================

v1: 
Initial Release.
author: MadCat221
